ANU.name: Trang X. Ta
ANU.colleges: College of Arts and Social Sciences
interest: Medical anthropology; health and hygiene regimes; science and technology studies; cultural politics of food and eating; food safety and food-bourne illnesses; nutritional ideologies; cultural studies of the body and subjectivity; gender and sexuality; ageing and the elderly; institutional life; the study of the everyday; moral economies; the state and technologies of governance; mainland China and Hong Kong.
